en.title: Official Opening of FE Thailand Country Licensee , 16th August 2008.
en.content:
.



Grand Opening of Supamongkol (FE Quantum Pendant Fair)
16th August 2008 at Indoor Stadium Hua Mak
Estimated Number of participants: 2,000 – 5,000 persons
TIME PROGRAM
14.00 hrs. Participants will enter into the multi-purpose activity area of the Indoor Stadium Hua Mak.  Music performance begins.
14.30 hrs. A chartered helicopter will bring Mr. Paul Ting; FE Founder Director & Ceo, Mr. KS Lee; FE Founder Director & International Sales Director, Gen. Dato Kitti Rattanachaya, GHI Advisory Board President, Mr. Supanut Don Chan, GHI President & FE Thailand Country Licensee to view the location area of GHI Office and activity area from sky. The helicopter will then fly them to the multi-purpose activity area at the Indoor Stadium, Hua Mak.
15.00 hrs. 9 parachute jumpers will jump from the helicopter bearing FE Quantum Pendant Flag, 2 Malaysian flags, 2 Thai National flags, 2 Fusion Excel flags and 2 Great Honour  flags, total of 9 flags, from the sky to the ground.
15.30 hrs. 9 cavalries on horseback will receive the flags from the parachute jumpers. The 9 cavalries on horseback holding the flags will be lead by a marching Military Band to the stage.
16.00 hrs. The 9 flags will be raised on the large stage.
16.10 hrs. Gen. Dato Kitti Rattanachaya, Mr. Paul Ting, Mr. KS Lee , Mr. Don Chan and VIPs’ will cut the ribbon, silk cloth and release balloons on the opening of “FE Quantum Pendant Fair”. VIPs’ from GHI and FE will give speeches of congratulation.
17.00 hrs. Official Launching of the first book written by Mr. Supanut Don Chan entitled, “Thinking for Opportunity” and introduction of famous Thai folk singer “Looktan Daensawan”.

Guests and participants will be entertained by  musical performances, famous singers and dancers on the full stage area.
18.30 hrs. End of Program.
<Back To Summary>
